SEARCH
Package com.sympos2.repositories

Interface UserRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Usuario,String>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Usuario,String>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Usuario,String>, org.springframework.data.mongodb.repository.MongoRepository<Usuario,String>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Usuario,String>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Usuario>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Usuario,String>
@Repository public interface UserRepository extends org.springframework.data.mongodb.repository.MongoRepository<Usuario,String>
This Interface manages the User objects from database.
Version:
0.1.0
Author:
KurixDeCuatroCuernos

    • findByIdOnlyIdAndNameAndRole

      returns a List of User objects if founds one or more, or an empty List if not.

    • findAllParams

      @Query("{ \'$or\': [ { \'$expr\': { \'$regexMatch\': { \'input\': { \'$toString\': \'$_id\' }, \'regex\': ?0, \'options\': \'i\' } } }, { \'name\': { \'$regex\': ?0, \'$options\': \'i\' } }, { \'email\': { \'$regex\': ?0, \'$options\': \'i\' } }, { \'role\': { \'$regex\': ?0, \'$options\': \'i\' } }, { \'studies\': { \'$regex\': ?0, \'$options\': \'i\' } }, { \'school\': { \'$regex\': ?0, \'$options\': \'i\' } }, { \'phone\': { \'$regex\': ?0, \'$options\': \'i\' } }, { \'studies_title\': { \'$regex\': ?0, \'$options\': \'i\' } }, { \'study_place\': { \'$regex\': ?0, \'$options\': \'i\' } }, { \'$expr\': { \'$regexMatch\': { \'input\': { \'$toString\': \'$fechaNac\' }, \'regex\': ?0, \'options\': \'i\' } } }] }") List<Usuario> findAllParams(String search)
      This method finds all User objects in database by any coincidence with the search input.
      Parameters:
      search - String with the text to find any coincidence.
      Returns:
      returns a List of User objects if founds one or more, or an empty List if not.
